001package io.github.ai4ci.abm.behaviour;
002
003import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.complianceRestoreSlowly;
004import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.decreaseSociabilitySlowlyIfSymptomatic;
005import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.restoreSociabilitySlowlyIfAsymptomatic;
006import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.toLastBranchPoint;
007
008import io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonState;
009import io.github.ai4ci.abm.PersonState;
010import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.State;
011import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateMachineContext;
012import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.DefaultNoTesting;
013import io.github.ai4ci.util.Sampler;
014
015/**
016 * A behaviour model for people who are symptomatic. This is a default model
017 * that does not have any testing or similar behaviour, but does have the
018 * expected behavioural changes of a symptomatic person, such as reduced
019 * sociability and increased compliance.
020 *
021 * @author Rob Challen
022 */
023public enum Symptomatic implements BehaviourModel, DefaultNoTesting {
024
025        /**
026         * Default symptomatic behaviour model.
027         */
028        DEFAULT {
029                @Override
030                public State.BehaviourState nextState(
031                                ImmutablePersonState.Builder builder, PersonState person,
032                                StateMachineContext context, Sampler rng
033                ) {
034                        decreaseSociabilitySlowlyIfSymptomatic(builder, person);
035                        restoreSociabilitySlowlyIfAsymptomatic(builder, person);
036                        complianceRestoreSlowly(builder, person);
037                        // N.B.: this could lead to frequent flip-flopping from
038                        // compliance to non compliance:
039                        if (person.isCompliant()) { return toLastBranchPoint(context); }
040                        return Symptomatic.DEFAULT;
041                }
042        };
043
044}
